string.value: When you complete #p1012118#'s training, #p1013000# flaps his wings wanting to say something to you. Talk to #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# says that since you've become stronger through training, you should now be able to defeat the #o2220100#! He wants you to obtain the #b#t4000009#s#k and bring them to #p1010100#. Sheesh, he is so impatient. Go to the #m106010100#.\r\n\r\n#i4000009# #t4000009# #b#c4000009# / 20#k
#p1010100# was very surprised and happy to receive the #t4000009#.
Master, master! Now that our skills have gotten better, let's go hunt the #o2220100#s! Come on!\r\n#b#L0#But it's too dangerous...#l\n#k
That was because we were weaker back then. But now that we've trained, #o2220100#s are easy! \r\n#b#L0#But I promised...#l\n#k
If it looks like it'll be too dangerous, we can just run away. Come on! Let's at least test if we can elminate a #o2220100#! What do you say? Please!
Woohoo! Really? Let's hurry! According to what that female human said, the #r#o2220100#s#k seem to be in a place called the #b#m106010100##k! Let's hurry and go there!
If we get #b20 #t4000009#s#k and give it to that female human named #p1010100#, she'll be so surprised! We'll be heroes that helped a person in trouble!
Master is a chicken, a scaredy cat, a wussy... What else is there?
Evan? You haven't returned to the farm yet? Huh? This...oh my. So many #t4000009#s! You didn't get these yourself did you?
I told you to not go near the #m106010100# because it's dangerous! You should've listened to me!

But since you've got so many of these, I guess you can handle the #o2220100#s. I guess I can't even really yell at you... Sheesh, I'll let it go this time but please don't break your promises in the future. Okay?

In any case, you really are very strong for your age. What's your secret? You might be as strong as the Guards at the Dungeon entrances. They might even come ask you for help. Maybe when you're level 20 or so?
Master, she said that there are many #r#o2220100#s#k at a place called the #b#m106010100##k. If you bring #b20#k #b#t4000009#s#k to the female human named #p1010100#, she'll be so surprised!

How will I be able to get the #b#t4000009#s#k... I'm going to need at least #b20#k... Is there anyone who could help me? Oh, Evan...I'm not talking to you so don't pay any attention. Don't forget your promise, okay?
